ovdesc.p: The vault control application enables a bank to maintain details of certificates retained by the bank
Each Vault control record represents an actual certificate retained in the Banks vault.
Records can be input & maintained manually
Records are automatically created for receipt transactions when using the following applications: SEC.TRADE SECRURITY.TRANSFER POSITION.TRANSFER
Records are automatically removed for delivery transactions when using the above applications.

This field is used to move manually created VAULT.CONTROL records to history. If a VAULT.CONTROL record was created by user input and the user now wants to indicate that the item in the bank vault that the VAULT.CONTROL record represents has been removed from the Vault then the user should input 'YES' in this field. On authorisation this will result in the VAULT.CONTROL record being written to history.

With regard to VAULT.CONTROL records generated through the input of a transaction, such as SEC.TRADE, these cannot normally be removed. However, if the need arises, you can effect the removal of an automatically created VAULT.CONTROL by setting the ALLOW.REMOVAL field in the VAULT.PARAMETER file to "Y".
No input field if VAULT.CONTROL record has been created from a VAULT.EXPECT record - i.e. linked to a trade unless the ALLOW.REMOVE flag has been set to "Y" in VAULT.PARAMETER
Only input of 'YES' or 'NO' allowed.
